snippet: China said that its monthly trade deficit reached $31.5 billion in February, its weakest performance in over a decade and the latest indication of slowing growth in the nation’s economy.
abstract: China says that its monthly trade deficit reached $31.5 billion in February, its weakest performance in over a decade and the latest indication of slowing growth in the nation’s economy.
lead_paragraph: China said that its monthly trade deficit reached $31.5 billion in February, its weakest performance in over a decade and the latest indication of slowing growth in the nation’s economy.

headline.seo: China Reports a Huge Trade Deficit
headline.main: For China, Big Deficit in Trading Last Month
headline.print_headline: For China, Big Deficit In Trading Last Month
